PRESS RELEASE â€“ October 28, 2022

JOHN NORUM releases his new album â€œGONE TO STAYâ€.

John Norum is mostly known as the founder and lead guitarist of the rock band Europe, which quickly took the name as Swedenâ€™s biggest rock export with songs such as â€œThe Final Countdownâ€, â€œCarrieâ€ and â€œRock the Nightâ€, and has sold over 15 million albums worldwide.

Today marks the release of his 9th solo album titled â€œGONE TO STAYâ€. Three singles from the album has previously been released: â€œSail Onâ€, â€œVoices of Silenceâ€ and â€œOne by Oneâ€ (feat. Ã…ge Sten Nilsen)â€™ and now youâ€™ll finally get to hear the highly ancitipated album in its entirety.

Among some of the previously unheard tracks from the album you can hear John Norum making a revisit of his song â€œFace the Truthâ€ which was released back in 1992, his interpretation of none other than David Bowieâ€™s â€œLady Grinning Soulâ€, and another guest vocal performance by Ã…ge Sten Nilsen on â€œNormaâ€.

The album is produced by John Norum together with Peer Stappe.

Mixed by Wyn Davis at Total Access Recording Studios

Mastered at Peerless Mastering

The title track â€œGone to Stayâ€ is released together with a music video directed by award-winning Patric Ullaeus from rEvolver Film Company.

Watch the music video on GAIN YT channel: GONE TO STAY

â€œGONE TO STAYâ€ is out now on all music streaming platforms https://orcd.co/gonetostay, as well as on CD and vinyl https://orcd.co/gonetostaycdlp (GAIN / Fifth Music Island).

The Japanese release by Victor JVC with the instrumental bonus track â€œMagnetic Soulâ€ can be ordered at Jvcmusic.co.jp

Overseas people can purchase it via parallel exporting services: CD Japan, Amazon.JP and HMV Japan.

Sincerely Fifth Island Music and GAIN.

Press/promo contact: simon@fifthislandmusic.se.

October 25, 2022

JOHN NORUMâ€˜s 9th solo album GONE TO STAY is out OCTOBER 28th by GAIN / FIFTH ISLAND MUSIC and VICTOR JVC! With three smashing singles released, weâ€™ll finally get to hear the album in its entirety this Friday!

PRESS RELEASE â€“ August 10, 2022

JOHN NORUM will release his 9th solo album titled â€œGONE TO STAYâ€ on October 28, 2022.

Mostly known as the founder and lead guitarist from the rock band Europe that quickly took the name as Swedenâ€™s biggest rock export with the songs â€œThe Final Countdownâ€, â€œCarrieâ€ and â€œRock the Nightâ€, and has sold over 15 million albums worldwide.

Two singles from the album have been released: â€œSAIL ONâ€ and â€œVOICES OF SILENCEâ€œ, and will be closely followed by the third single â€œONE BY ONEâ€ which is set for release this September 2nd.

The album is produced by John Norum himself together with Peer Stappe, and mixed by Wyn Davis.

The album will be released on the 28th of October. It will be available digitally on all streaming platforms, as well as on CD and vinyl available for pre-order NOW.

Click/tap the image to enter the ALBUM PRE-ORDER page

(European release by GAIN / Fifth Island Music)

Sincerely, FIFTH ISLAND MUSIC and GAIN

PRESS RELEASE â€“ April 29, 2022

JOHN NORUM is set to release his 9th solo album titled GONE TO STAY later this year. Mostly known as the founder and lead guitarist from the rock band Europe that quickly took the name as Swedenâ€™s biggest rock export with the songs â€œThe Final Countdownâ€, â€œCarrieâ€ and â€œRock the Nightâ€, and has sold over 10 million albums worldwide.

Furthermore, Norum has collaborated with many known musicians such as Don Dokken, Marcel Jacob, Glenn Hughes to name a few.

Sincerely: FIFTH ISLAND MUSIC, GAIN, LINC and DOCKS.

For press inquiries and requests please contact: simon@fifthislandmusic.se.
